price: Enti wͻnnwen Qur’aan no ho nnkͻ akyiri anaa? Anaasε (yεde) krado ato wͻn akoma mu (a enti εmma nokorε no ntumi nwura mu anaa)?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ أَمۡ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقۡفَالُهَآ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: afalā yatadabbarūna al-qur'āna am ʿalā qulūbin aqfāluhā
